name: Animated Memory Game
description: Through out the year of 2019 I plan to release a game once per week. For week three I chose to focus on animations. This memory game has animations for dealing the cards as well as flipping them over. You will also find the finest programmer art that free can buy on the cards! Enjoy!  You can learn more about the development process and the challenge that I am doing this year over at my YouTube channel.  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuI9aqy-pdD8H0Cz1dUCe0Q
